segments.text: My name is Wang Liang , I â€™ m from Beijing . Where do you come from ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I come from the city of Tangshan in Hebes Province .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're from Tangshan ? I can't believe my ears . I was also born in Tangshan , but I was brought up in Beijing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? It's nice to meet you . How long have you been with this company ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just over 4 years now . Since this is your first day here , I'm sure you don't really know too much yet . Let me show you around , so you can introduce yourself to everyone .
segments.speaker: S1
